WorkItem.Description:
Hi,

it is possible to correct the word in the Report-Section for "Gedownloadet" into "Heruntergeladen". It sounds better!

Also in the Report-Section the translation has an error "Nur Computergruppen mit Genehmigng anzeigen" must be "Nur Computergruppen mit Genehmigung anzeigen"

Thanks

Comments.Message:
OK, we will add it in the next release.

Thank you for the Feedback. ;)

Winfried

I have made the change.

Thank you Dusselritter.
